Eventually, I applied for cheque book containing 10 cheques through the IDFC First Bank app also I had to upload my signature to do the same.

I'd request your concerned team to clearly mention what all actually come with the welcome kit along with a check list for future new customers of your bank. Thanks

The process of opening my joint account was unduly delayed, taking over three months to complete. It was a highly tedious and frustrating experience, requiring numerous visits to the bank for resubmitting documents and signing multiple times. Each resubmission was met with rejection by the back-end team, often without clear guidance, causing significant inconvenience and hardship. Overall, the procedure was unnecessarily cumbersome, and I was left thoroughly dissatisfied with the entire experience.

I faced a lot of difficulties while opening NRE and NRO accounts. 1. As a first step, I tried contacting customer support multiple times and all they said I'll arrange a call back from the sales team which I never received, 2. no response from nriservices@idfcfirstbank.com as well. 3. I have to escalate to nodal officer and then Principal nodal officer. 4. Despite being an existing IDFC credit card holder, the customer care IVR system only provides credit card-related options, making it difficult to reach the appropriate team. To request a callback, I had to escalate to RNO, after which I was contacted via email to submit documents. However, there has been no follow-up since then. 5. Overall process took longer around 2 months. 6. The Branch employees are clueless and not aware the indepth knowledge which took longer turn around time to create account. 7. Lot of back and fourth with emails, branch visits, calls and ended up creating around 10 service tickets just to open NRE, NRO accounts. 8. Never received any welcome call or email to share product details after receiving welcome kit. Overall dissatisfied with account opening in your bank and I never encourage anyone banking with you.

I am writing to express my deep dissatisfaction with the service I have received regarding the update of my communication address.

 

I was contacted by your customer care team on 16th May�2025 and encouraged to open a zero-balance account online. I clearly informed the representative that I would proceed only after my home address was updated. I was advised that the address could be updated during the account opening process.

 

Following the instructions provided, I completed the process. However, I later received a message on 19th May�2025 stating that my welcome kit would be sent to the old address. Upon logging into the IDFC FIRST Bank app, I confirmed that my address had not been updated.

Since then, I have made multiple attempts to contact customer care and update the address via the mobile app using my Aadhaar card. Unfortunately, I continue to receive an error message stating, �Try again later.� Despite repeated efforts since 19th May�2025, the issue remains unresolved, and I have received no meaningful support or resolution from your team.

 

Due to this ongoing inconvenience and lack of response, I have decided to close this account. I request that you first update my communication address as per my Aadhaar card and then assist me in opening a new account with the same benefits that were originally offered.

Namaste Sir, your bank is very reputed and has a prominent position in India for its good service and your bank provides good support to people in their financial matters.Our account was opened in your bank after getting loan approval through Paisa Bazar.But the way the female executive who called us for verification before giving the loan behaved with us, it seems that such people are worried about your bank.The result of not giving a loan is that we have taken loans in the past but there is no late fee or check bounce or cibill rank deficiency in it.Also, if our record is in default or we have a lot of outstanding loans, we also accept that our loan may be rejected even though the title is completely clear, but we are not only dependent on your bank.Our work is done, but we are giving this reply because if you keep such staff, your bank will only suffer losses in the long run. We are not sad that we did not get the loan, but we are sad that we did not get the right result.And it also makes sense that you need customers with defaulters and late fees, as well as those who are not practical, rather than those with good records
.Finally, I would like to say that I am sorry that you could not complete our valuation and that due to your failure, we were lucky to get a loan from a better bank than yours and at a lower interest rate. Your policy was good.Also, in the coming days, we will make this thing viral in our account, credit card account, my husband's credit card account, as well as in our group circle, WhatsApp group, Instagram, and we will inform you that IDFC Bank This type of service is provided so that we can show everyone our own experience of not opening an account in this bank.
